text: Leslie Arnold Reed (born 12 December 1952) is an English football coach. He is the technical director of the Football Association (FA) since February 2019. He formerly served as technical director of the FA between 2002 and 2004. He was the manager of Charlton Athletic between 14 November and 24 December 2006. From April 2010 and November 2018, Reed was Head of Football Development and the Vice-Chairman of Football at Southampton. Reed was born in Wapping, London. He was signed as a player for the clubs Cambridge United, Watford and Wycombe Wanderers but never played. He played as a centre forward. ==References== ==Other websites== * Les Reed at Soccerbase Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from London Category:English football managers Category:Association football coaches Category:Watford F.C. players
title: Les Reed (football manager)
